Plot: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.
Title: American Splendor
Writer: Harvey Pekar (comic book series American Splendor), Joyce Brabner (comic book series Our Cancer Year), Shari Springer Berman, Robert Pulcini
Actors: Chris Ambrose, Joey Krajcar, Josh Hutcherson, Cameron Carter
tomatoConsensus: Exhilarating both stylistically and for its entertaining, moving portrayal of an everyman, American Splendor is a portrait of a true underground original.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 47 nominations.
